member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Security.IoT.Agent.Common.Utils.NetstatUtils
member.summary: Helper class for parsing the output of netstat commands

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Security.IoT.Agent.Common.Utils.NetstatUtils.NetstatProtocols
member.summary: Prtocol to parse

members.member:
The method receieves an output of 'netstat' command It parse only the rows in "LISTEN" state Returns a list of information per each "LISTEN" socket Implementation remark: We can't use the .NET API GetActiveTcpListeners since this API returns listeners in all TCP states except the Listen state. That's why we have to parse the netstat output
the output of 'netstat -nlpt' command as expected in Linux /// the number of the column that contains local addresses /// the number of the column that contains remote addresses /// the number of the column that contains PID A list of information per each "LISTEN" socket
